title: Neil Parish – 2022 Personal Statement on Allegations of Watching Pornography
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Neil Parish, the Conservative MP for Tiverton and Honiton, on 29 April 2022.
content: Following recent allegations regarding an MP’s use of their mobile phone in Parliament, I have referred myself to the Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards in the House of Commons.
I will be cooperating fully with any investigation, and whilst it is ongoing I will continue to perform my duties as MP for Tiverton and Honiton.
I will not be making further comments at this stage.
